detaileddescription.para: This function sets all cells on the game board to DEAD and initializes specific cells to ALIVE.

parameterdescription.para: The game board represented as a 2D array of cells.

briefdescription.para: Updates the game board to the next generation based on the current state.

detaileddescription.para: This function calculates the next generation of cells based on the current state and updates the game board accordingly.

parameterdescription.para: The game board represented as a 2D array of cells.

briefdescription.para: Prints the game board to the console.

detaileddescription.para: This function prints the current state of the game board to the console. Alive cells are represented by '*' characters, and dead cells are represented by '.' characters.

parameterdescription.para: The game board represented as a 2D array of cells.

detaileddescription.para: This function counts objects on neighbouring cells.

parameterdescription.para: The game board represented as a 2D array of cells.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct cell board[ROWS][COLS], int row, int col)
memberdef.name: count_neighbors
